data.title: MoCkInG
data.statement:
You need to revive the good old Spongebobmeme!

<<YoU kNoW wAhT i MeAn!>>

The first letter should be <<capitalized>>, the second <<lower>>, the third again <<capitalized>>,... and so on.

testCases.title: Who lives in a pineapple under the sea?
Is mayonnaise an instrument?
testCases.testIn: No Patrick, mayonnaise is not an instrument.
testCases.testOut: No PaTrIcK, mAyOnNaIsE iS nOt An InStRuMeNt.

testCases.title: I've never seen so many mattress.
testCases.testIn: Patrick: (looks around and thinks) 10. SpongeBob: Cool.
testCases.testOut: PaTrIcK: (lOoKs ArOuNd AnD tHiNkS) 10. sPoNgEbOb: CoOl.

testCases.title: special character
testCases.testIn: Lol. I think a : is just a . with a friend. (-Kappa-)
testCases.testOut: LoL. i ThInK a : Is JuSt A . wItH a FrIeNd. (-KaPpA-)

data.inputDescription: The string: [[input]]  which need to be converted.
data.outputDescription: A string with the correct converted input.

lastVersion.statementHTML:
Goal

You need to revive the good old Spongebobmeme!

YoU kNoW wAhT i MeAn!

The first letter should be capitalized, the second lower, the third again capitalized,... and so on.
Input
The string: input which need to be converted.
Output
A string with the correct converted input.
Constraints
input is at least 2 characters long.
Example
Input
Squidward
Output
SqUiDwArD
